sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { principalAPI } from '../../services/api'; const PrincipalDashboard = () => { const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user') || '{}'); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const [statistics, setStatistics] = useState(null); const [courses, setCourses] = useState([]); const [reports, setReports] = useState([]); const [lecturers, setLecturers] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { loadDashboardData(); }, []); const loadDashboardData = async () => { try { setLoading(true); // For now, using mock data - replace with actual API calls // const statsResponse = await principalAPI.getStatistics(user.faculty); // const coursesResponse = await principalAPI.getCourses(user.faculty); // const reportsResponse = await principalAPI.getReports(user.faculty); // const lecturersResponse = await principalAPI.getLecturers(user.faculty); // Mock data for testing setTimeout(() => { setStatistics({ courses: { total_courses: 8, total_lecturers: 5, total_classes: 12 }, reports: { total_reports: 45, avg_attendance: 38.5, reporting_lecturers: 5 }, ratings: { avg_rating: 4.3, total_ratings: 120 } }); setCourses([ { id: 1, course_code: 'DIWA2110', course_name: 'Web Application Development', lecturer_name: 'Dr. John Smith', report_count: 12, average_rating: 4.5 }, { id: 2, course_code: 'DINM2110', course_name: 'Network Management', lecturer_name: 'Prof. Sarah Johnson', report_count: 10, average_rating: 4.2 }, { id: 3, course_code: 'DIDS2110', course_name: 'Database Systems', lecturer_name: 'Dr. Mike Wilson', report_count: 8, average_rating: 4.1 }, { id: 4, course_code: 'DIPR2110', course_name: 'Programming Fundamentals', lecturer_name: 'Prof. Emily Brown', report_count: 15, average_rating: 4.4 } ]); setReports([ { id: 1, course_code: 'DIWA2110', course_name: 'Web Application Development', lecturer_name: 'Dr. John Smith', class_name: 'BIT-1A', date_of_lecture: '2024-10-01', week_of_reporting: 'Week 6', actual_students_present: 38, topic_taught: 'Introduction to React and Component Architecture', average_rating: 4.2, rating_count: 15, principal_feedback: 'Good coverage of React fundamentals. Consider adding more practical examples.' }, { id: 2, course_code: 'DINM2110', course_name: 'Network Management', lecturer_name: 'Prof. Sarah Johnson', class_name: 'BIT-1B', date_of_lecture: '2024-09-28', week_of_reporting: 'Week 5', actual_students_present: 42, topic_taught: 'Network Protocols and TCP/IP Model', average_rating: 4.5, rating_count: 12, principal_feedback: null } ]); setLecturers([ { id: 1, name: 'Dr. John Smith', email: 'john.smith@luct.ac.ls', course_count: 2, report_count: 12, avg_rating: 4.5 }, { id: 2, name: 'Prof. Sarah Johnson', email: 'sarah.johnson@luct.ac.ls', course_count: 1, report_count: 10, avg_rating: 4.2 }, { id: 3, name: 'Dr. Mike Wilson', email: 'mike.wilson@luct.ac.ls', course_count: 2, report_count: 8, avg_rating: 4.1 }, { id: 4, name: 'Prof. Emily Brown', email: 'emily.brown@luct.ac.ls', course_count: 1, report_count: 15, avg_rating: 4.4 } ]); setLoading(false); }, 1000); } catch (error) { console.error('Error loading PRL dashboard:', error); setLoading(false); } }; const renderStars = (rating) => { return (
{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map(star => ( ★ ))} ({rating?.toFixed(1) || 'N/A'})
); }; if (loading) { return (
Loading...

Loading Principal Dashboard...

); } return (

Principal Lecturer Dashboard

Stream: {user.faculty}

PRL
{/* Navigation Tabs */}
{/* Overview Tab */} {activeTab === 'overview' && (
{/* Statistics Cards */}
{statistics?.courses?.total_courses || 0}

Total Courses

{statistics?.reports?.total_reports || 0}

Teaching Reports

{statistics?.courses?.total_lecturers || 0}

Lecturers

{statistics?.ratings?.avg_rating?.toFixed(1) || 'N/A'}

Avg Rating

{/* Quick Stats */}
Attendance Overview

Average Attendance: {statistics?.reports?.avg_attendance?.toFixed(1) || 0} students

Reporting Lecturers: {statistics?.reports?.reporting_lecturers || 0} / {statistics?.courses?.total_lecturers || 0}

Total Classes: {statistics?.courses?.total_classes || 0}

Rating Overview

Average Rating: {statistics?.ratings?.avg_rating?.toFixed(1) || 'N/A'} / 5.0

Total Ratings: {statistics?.ratings?.total_ratings || 0}

Student Engagement: High

{/* Recent Activity */}
Recent Reports
{reports.slice(0, 3).map(report => (
{report.course_code} - {report.lecturer_name} {new Date(report.date_of_lecture).toLocaleDateString()}

{report.topic_taught.substring(0, 60)}...

{report.actual_students_present} students {renderStars(report.average_rating)}
))}
)} {/* Courses Tab */} {activeTab === 'courses' && (
Courses in {user.faculty} Stream
{courses.map(course => ( ))}
Course Code Course Name Lecturer Reports Avg Rating Actions
{course.course_code} {course.course_name} {course.lecturer_name} {course.report_count} {renderStars(course.average_rating)}
)} {/* Reports Tab */} {activeTab === 'reports' && (
Teaching Reports
View reports and provide feedback
{reports.length === 0 ? (
No Reports Available

There are no teaching reports in your stream yet.

) : (
{reports.map(report => (
{report.course_code} - {report.course_name}

Lecturer: {report.lecturer_name} | Class: {report.class_name} | Date: {new Date(report.date_of_lecture).toLocaleDateString()}

{report.actual_students_present} students {renderStars(report.average_rating)}

Topic: {report.topic_taught}

))}
)}
)} {/* Lecturers Tab */} {activeTab === 'lecturers' && (
Lecturers in {user.faculty} Stream
{lecturers.map(lecturer => ( ))}
Name Email Courses Reports Avg Rating Performance
{lecturer.name} {lecturer.email} {lecturer.course_count} {lecturer.report_count} {renderStars(lecturer.avg_rating)} {lecturer.avg_rating >= 4.0 ? ( Excellent ) : lecturer.avg_rating >= 3.0 ? ( Good ) : ( Needs Improvement )}
)} {/* Monitoring Tab */} {activeTab === 'monitoring' && (
Academic Monitoring
Overview of teaching activities and performance
Attendance Monitoring
85% Average Attendance
Report Submission Rate
78% Reports Submitted
Student Satisfaction
4.3/5.0 Rating
Feedback Completion
65% Feedback Provided
Recent Monitoring Notes
  • Oct 2: High attendance in Web Development classes
  • Oct 1: Network Management ratings improved
  • Sep 30: Reminder sent for pending reports
)}
); }; export default PrincipalDashboard;
